Howdy!

I’m Danny Pagano – a designer and photographer from Tucson, Arizona. I design simple things for complex clients.

Scintillation Nanotechnologies

Identity design for a life sciences startup empowering new, unseen insights in biological research.

Track North

Identity design for a rail services conglomerate serving the northern United States.

Aspera

Logo design for a first of its kind NASA mission to study previously unseen galactic filaments in UV.

Natural Selection 2

Worldbuilding and production design work for a Sci-fi first-person shooter title on PC.

Clip Health

Visual identity and web design for a consumer health startup creating Covid19 testing products for home use.

Fairwheel Bikes

Product photography for an internationally recognized retailer of bespoke bikes and hard to find components.

Moonfest

Logo design for the University of Arizona's half-centenary celebration of the Apollo 11 moon landing.

Nixie Watch

Shopify website build with commissioned product photography for a unique watch.
